actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Mathias without amendment. With written report No. 97-501.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 714.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the Select Committee on Ethics to provide training assistance to its professional staff.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Select Committee on Ethics to provide specialized training assistance for members of its professional staff. Allows such assistance in the form of pay continuance during training periods or grants of funds for training expenses. Requires the Committee to obtain from an employee receiving such assistance an agreement with respect to continued employment upon completion of training.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the Select Committee on Ethics to provide training assistance to its professional staff.
